headline: Stock Market Today: S&P 500, Dow Slide As Netflix, GE Aerospace Earnings Loom (Live Coverage)
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average and other major stock indexes fell Friday as Wall Street looked ahead to a three-day weekend. Among movers, obesity drug stock Novo Nordisk and PNC Financial Services each jumped on the stock market today.

headline: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Waffle As Netflix, GE Aerospace Earnings Loom (Live Coverage)
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average and other major stock indexes wavered in afternoon trading Friday as Wall Street looked ahead to a three-day weekend. Among the winners was obesity drug stock Novo Nordisk, which surged on the stock market today.
